title: Browser timer for Active Collab 5
name: browsertimeractivecollab
description: Web timer for Active Collab. It stores time for each task in the time tracking section so you can use it for billing and reports.
author: Erom Agency

preferences.name: installUrl
preferences.title: Install URL
preferences.description: If you are using the self-hosted version of Active Collab, please enter here the install URL (must start with "http://" or "https://" and end with "/"). If you don't add an install URL, the extension defaults to the URL of the cloud version.
